name: SDL2_mixer
desc:
SDL_mixer is a sample multi-channel audio mixer library. 
It supports any number of simultaneously playing channels of 16 bit stereo
audio, plus a single channel of music, mixed by the popular FLAC, MikMod
MOD, Timidity MIDI, Ogg Vorbis, and SMPEG MP3 libraries.

As of SDL_mixer 1.2.7, FLAC, MikMod, Ogg Vorbis and MP3 loading libraries
are dynamically loaded, so if you don
